attributes.action: relieve people who have worked and are working during the pandemic of taxes
attributes.additional_details:
I do not agree with the parliament that offers grants to the self-employed,they sit at home and relax
And we, the employees at the factories, delivery companies, have been at work all this time, putting our lives in danger and paying taxes.
that is why I would like parliament to exempt employees from taxes
attributes.background: I would like employees not to pay taxes or pay less during this period

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572273
